text: @KamalaHarris You are more stupid than we ever Imagined!!!   The coronavirus doesn’t see race or color it doesn’t distinguish between those factors at all!!!!  Do you think maybe that demonstrating, rioting and looting with masks and not social distancing maybe had  an impact?? Hmmmmm.
